Entries.{{ModId}}_DH_Intro: Location/Trouble at the Agency/Crystal needs you at the agency ASAP to discuss Edwin's disappearance./Visit the agency./{{ModId}}_DeadBoyAgency/-1/0/-1/false/0
Entries.{{ModID}}_FQ.VisitAgency: Location/Nightly Noises/Present a case to the Dead Boy Detective Agency./Visit the agency and tell them about what you overheard Sebastian say./{{ModId}}_DeadBoyAgency/-1/0/-1/true
Entries.{{ModID}}_FQ.ConductInterview: Location/Interview with a Ghost/Figure out the cause of the noises./Visit Shallow Sound Cemetery with Charles to investigate the ghostly noises./{{ModId}}_Graveyard/-1/0/-1/true
Entries.{{ModId}}_FQ.Research: Location/Founder's Fate/Research Pelican Town history./Conduct research at the library with Niko and Edwin to determine who the ghost was and what her unfinished business may be./ArchaeologyHouse/-1/0/-1/true
